name: CommonLanguagesWritten
title: Common Languages (Written)
description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47) for the purpose of writing; this value set (unlike the common languages value set) doesn't include dialects except where they are relevant for written languages
